quest.name: Sing Me Another Song
journal: In a place such as Revenant's Toll, information must flow along with wine. Why not linger downstream of Alys for a spell?

Even after moons of pensive strumming, the wandering minstrel still refuses to budge from his spot in the Seventh Heaven, ever bent on collecting the makings of a new epic. Heed Alys's counsel and speak with this gilder of lilies, for the commonfolk are in sore need of even a fool's gold.

You recount to the bard your foray into the lightless depths of Dalamud's Shadow, and are amazed to see the leaden horror of those hours transmuted to gold by the minstrel's gifts. The power of poetry is such that you can now relive the experience, should you so choose.

※The Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage) may be accessed via the Duty Finder.

dialogue.name: ALYS
dialogue.text: What'll it be, Forename? You know, if you have a second, a certain patron of mine's been itching to have a word with you─our friend the bard here.

dialogue.name: ALYS
dialogue.text: He says he needs inspiration that only an adventurer's tale could provide. Plain lacking in imagination, if you ask me, but he's not a bad sort. Wandering or not, he never tries to pay in song what he owes in copper.

dialogue.name: ALYS
dialogue.text: Anyway, if you're so inclined, I'm sure he'd be glad to hear all about one of your more impressive exploits.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Forename, can it be you? You've outdone yourself since last we met, that much I've heard.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: They say you sojourned to Dalamud's Shadow, yet live to tell the tale!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: I was in these parts at the time, and felt a disturbance in the aether. It was the White Raven himself, you say? Ah, no wonder!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Tell me more, my good Forename! Recount to me your journey through the Shadow... Take me there, on the wings of memory and imagination!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Your stirring tale has...has...stirred me! Lo, I am as a cauldron bubbling fragrantly in the great kitchen of a castle keep. A stew of inspiration─a slew of verses!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text:
Listen, my good adventurer, and listen well,
for the song I sing is of your tell.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text:
Into the flesh of Darkness go bringers of Light,♪
for the flame that flickers in Bahamut's tomb.♪
In that cloying black stirs a raven white,♪
clawing blood from a barren womb.♪

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text:
What was slain in silver proud did in golden malice rise.♪
Metals of infamy and ruin, that every hero must despise.♪

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: What say you? Is this not exactly how you told it to me?

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Ah, but you forget, I am a poet! We read between the lines, rendering into words that which was left unspoken. Lest you wonder, I shall name this composition “Shadow of the Raven.”

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Thanks to the musical stylings of the wandering minstrel, you can now relive your foray into the Second Coil of Bahamut.
